content: would it be possible/appropriate/accepted to create a seperate stream for HL7 affiliate discussions in different languages? e.g. a "HL7 D-A-CH" stream for user groups from Germany, Austria and Switzerland?
Oh, I just realize there are already streams in other languages :) SO I guess the answer is yes. Give me a second to figure out how to find these streams and rephrase my request...
ok. got it. May I request an open stream "germany", please? :) I will ask austria/switzerland about whether they want to join or have their own...
naming the threads by countries seems to be the de facto convention, so we'll stick with that.
Well, we've done that for countries but we don't have to do that.
as D-A-C would make sense for german-oriented people, a scandinavian stream could make sense ... perhaps

Iâ€™d really like to learned from the other affiliates and exchange experiences on how to handle the REALM specific Implementation Guides and Profiles (development , publication, sharing Multilanguage artefacts..)
Is the implementation stream the right channel ? Who else could be interested in it ?
Hi Giorgio, I think the conformance stream is a better place for this.
I have added a stream for italy
I have added a stream for Canada
